nodes.bodyText: I would name this accept or acceptAll, elements typically use accept(visitor) to call visitor.visitXY(element).
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,8 +38,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1928 net/minecraft/world/GameRules
 	FIELD field_9197 RULE_TYPES Ljava/util/Map;
 	METHOD <init> (Ljava/util/Map;)V
 		ARG 1 rules
-	METHOD method_20744 forEachType (Lnet/minecraft/class_1928$class_4311;)V
-		ARG 0 action
+	METHOD method_20744 visit (Lnet/minecraft/class_1928$class_4311;)V

nodes.bodyText:
This needs to be passive form, the visitor is visiting, not GameRules. Something like Make the visitor visit all game rules.\n\n

The visitation involves calling both visitor.accept() and visitor.acceptX() for every game rule, where X is the current rule's concrete type such as Boolean.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,8 +38,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1928 net/minecraft/world/GameRules
 	FIELD field_9197 RULE_TYPES Ljava/util/Map;
 	METHOD <init> (Ljava/util/Map;)V
 		ARG 1 rules
-	METHOD method_20744 forEachType (Lnet/minecraft/class_1928$class_4311;)V
-		ARG 0 action
+	METHOD method_20744 visit (Lnet/minecraft/class_1928$class_4311;)V
+		COMMENT Visits all registered game rules using the supplied visitor.
